backend/main.mo: Actor managing publish state, subdomain and domain settings, with functions to publish, unpublish, configure domain, and reset all storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components used, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one-line summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing light/dark mode OKLCH color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, and mounting root element for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component initializing React Query and layout, rendering the provisioning page with toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/ConnectDomainHel: Component showing DNS records, propagation info, and copy-to-clipboard actions for connecting custom domains.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, branding, and page structure around main content.
frontend/src/components/ProvisioningStat: Panel displaying subdomain/domain provisioning state with live/permanent vs draft URL details and status indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for checking publication status, fetching domain data, and performing publish, unpublish, domain configuration, and reset actions through an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors, layout, and typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/subdomainValidation.ts: Implements subdomain validation rules and normalization, enforcing DNS constraints and blocking a reserved subdomain.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app by wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/SubdomainProvisioning: UI page for managing subdomain provisioning, custom domains, and publication status with validation, backend queries, and mutation actions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and custom CSS variables for the design system.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for publishing a Caffeine site permanently and configuring DNS for jpdigitalmarketing.net. Includes existing features, new requests, issues, and architectural notes about domain setup.
